Description: Item DescriptionHello, I will support your music life from Japan.I will do my utmost for the service you satisfy. Charvel CDS-38 (Mod) From Japan. (T0374) Although the head logo has disappeared, it is originally a CDS-38 black body made by Charbel in the 90's.Gold parts are relatively clean.Since each part maintenance has been adjusted, you can play without problems. Although the parts remain original, we have changed to auto tap wiring (VAI wiring) by making pickup 3 core.Moreover, it is possible to produce 10 kinds of sounds in total with the addition of the mini switch. Because the body is light and the neck is thin, I think whether it is easy for beginners and women to play. ■ SpecificationHSH layout pickup24 frets (neck thickness about 2 cm)1V1T5 way selectorMini switch × 2 ■ Sound variation (VAI wiring)※ Upper case = Hum backing, lower case = SingleF (front hum backing)f + c (front single + center)c (center alone)r + c (rear single + center)R (rear ham backing) Mini switch can further combine the followingf, f + R, F + R, f + c + R, F + c + R ■ Mini switch 1When Positions 1 and 5, front PU and rear PU are mixed in parallel. For positions 2 and 4 it will be a parallel mix of all PUs. When used in combination with the mini switch 2, the tapped front PU is mixed. Position 3 is center PU alone. ■ Mini switch 2It is a forced tap of the front PU. It will act like SSH with auto tap. ・ The neck is just right warped to a good extent.Fret is about 80%.There are multiple dents and painting cracks in the body.・ Arm is not included. ShippingWorldwide shipment by EMS. Delivery time: about 2 weeks Terms of Sale I know your request by eBay's e-mail system. This product will be delivered to your house from Japan.About UsIf you are interested in an effects pedal, please let us knowAlso, please feel free to contact us for instruments and effectors.There are many good quality products throughout Japan.If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.International Buyers - Please Note:· Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping fee.These charges are the buyer's responsibility. · Please check how these additional costs will be in customs in your countryPlease offer a bid before purchase. · These fees are usually collected by the shipping company (transport company).
